thread.title_full: Big Tall Direct reviewed by John Cable

author: John Cable
title: John Cable
text: I ordered 2 pairs of casual pants and they said my order had been approved and that was 2 weeks ago. I have not heard anything from them in over 2 weeks. Their customer service stinks and I have used them for years with no real issues. Something has changed and I don't like it and will probably not use them again in the future depending upon when they fulfill my current order.
